4. Vulture bees are obligate necrophages.
5. Some bees forage for both pollen and carrion.

7. Vulture bees hunt wasp larvae.
8. Vulture bees do not visit flowers.
9. Vulture bees store carrion in their hives.
10. Vulture bees may use carrion to produce hypopharyngeal gland secretions or corpse honey.
